title: Why am i getting punished for game crashes?

replies.body:
These penalties come as a result of a *consistent trend* of disconnecting from matches. Regardless of the reason for their happening, it negatively impacts *everyone in the match*. 

The types of crashes you're describing will usually happen if your computer has a poor connection to our servers. Working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is likely to fix this, as it covers the most common network misconfigurations that conflict with League.

Let me know if those steps were able to resolve this issue.
